item.title: Postgres pg_service file
item.description:
What is the pg_service file ?

The importance of the Postgres pg_service file (pg_service.conf) ! The pg_service file allows libpq connection parameters to be associated with a single service name as part of command argument or when setting PGSERVICE environment variable. For example,

Commmand Line examples

pg_basebackup –pgdata=$PGDATA –dbname=service=basebackup –verbose –progress –checkpoint=fast –write-recovery-conf –wal-method=stream –waldir=/psql/pglog/13 –create-slot –slot=pgstandby2

$ su - postgres

$ psql service=myservice

postgres@postgres:49010=#

Setting environment variable PGSERVICE

pg() { PGSERVICE=$1 psql
